name: Halloweve - 4Bs 2025
description: KQ Seattle local tournament on Halloweve

name: WC Seattle 2025
description:
Seattle's West Circuit is a single day BYOT (bring your own team) tournament at 4Bs Tavern on Saturday, September 13, 2025. 

The tournament consists of a full round robin with the top two teams playing a championship match. 

The mission of the west circuit tournament is to encourage tournament-level play in western scenes & to encourage players to experiment with new roles and teams.
registration_message:
### Please read the following notes prior to filling out registration:

* You can change your information at any time while registration is open.

* Please provide a picture with your face clearly visible to help commentators identify you on the stream. 

* If your team's name is not finalized, select FREE AGENT and return later to create your team. Be sure to check if your team already exists before creating a new one.

#### The tournament entry fee for WC Seattle 2025 is $20. We are collecting payments via VENMO. Please send your entry fees to Toshi's VENMO @Hitoshi-Satow. 

* If you need assistance paying the entry fee VENMO what you can and the remainder will be covered by the community support fund.

* If you would like to DONATE additional funds to the community support fund in any amount, you are welcome to do so via VENMO as well.

### If you have any questions, please reach out to Toshi (@loproto) Matthew (@seemless), or Joyce (@krispyokreme) on Discord!

name: PAX West 2025
description: Up to 20 teams enter, only one will win!

name: ECC 2025
description: Join us for Seattle's 2025 Emerald City Classic (ECC). The tournament is a 2-day, BYOT (bring your own team) double elimination format at 4Bs in NW Seattle. Tournament will consist of group stage on Saturday and a double elimination bracket on Sunday.
registration_message:
### Please read the following notes prior to filling out registration:

* You can change your information at any time while registration is open.

* Please provide a picture with your face clearly visible to help commentators identify you on the stream. 

* If your team's name is not finalized, select FREE AGENT and return later to create your team. Be sure to check if your team already exists before creating a new one.

#### The tournament entry fee for ECC 2025 is $40. We are collecting payments via VENMO. Please send your entry fees to Toshi's VENMO @Hitoshi-Satow. 

* If you need assistance paying the entry fee VENMO what you can and the remainder will be covered by the community support fund.

* If you would like to DONATE additional funds to the community support fund in any amount, you are welcome to do so via VENMO as well.

### If you have any questions, please reach out to Rachel (rachface) or Matthew (seemless) on Discord!

name: WC Seattle 2024
description: Bring your team to sunny Seattle for our 2024 West Circuit tournament at 4B's on Saturday, August 31, 2024.  This one-day tournament will include a groups stage followed by a single elimination knockout bracket stage.

name: ECC 2024
description: Killer Queen Seattle's major national tournament Emerald City Classic is back again this year on March 30 and 31! Come experience spring in Seattle and compete in a 2-day, BYOT tournament at 4 B's Tavern with good games and great friends from across the national KQ scene. Visit the KQ Seattle website for links to tournament information (https://linktr.ee/kq_sea).

name: ECC 2023
description: Killer Queen Seattle's major national tournament Emerald City Classic is back again this year on August 19 and 20! Come experience the beauty of summer in Seattle and compete in a 2-day, BYOT tournament at 4 B's Tavern (the new and improved KQ tournament venue!) with good games and great friends from across the national KQ scene.
registration_message:
### Please read the following notes prior to filling out registration:

* You can change your information at any time while registration is open.

* Please provide a picture with your face clearly visible to help commentators identify you on the stream. We are also making team posters for the event. If you would prefer not to have your photo on the team poster, let us know.

* If your team's name is not finalized, select FREE AGENT and return later to create your team. Be sure to check if your team already exists before creating a new one.

* Tournament entry fee for ECC 2023 is $40. We are collecting payments via VENMO.

* If you would like to DONATE additional funds to the community support fund in any amount, you are welcome to do so via VENMO as well.

### If you have any questions, please reach out to Rachel (rachface) or Toshi (loproto) on Discord!

name: KQ SEA July Mixer
description: Come enjoy Bar-bee-queue and play some competitive games at the Seattle Killer Queen Summer mixer event. This draft style tournament will take place at Chez Nous. Draft will start at 2pm. Show up early for sign up and warm up.

name: KQ SEA Tournament Test
description: Testing out running a hivemind tournament

payment_message: Entry to Killer Queen Seattle's Emerald City Classic 2023 is $40. We understand some may need financial assistance and have provided an option for those with the ability to donate a tournament entry amount, as well as an option to chose the amount you donate to a community support fund.
